body.name: PURA D'OR Advanced Therapy Shampoo (16oz) Reduces Hair Thinning & Increases Volume, No Sulfate, Biotin Shampoo Infused with Argan Oil, Aloe Vera for All Hair Types, Men & Women (Packaging May Vary)

features: GET RID OF ITCHY, DRY SCALP. Scalp care shampoo with Zinc Pyrithione cleanses your scalp of bacteria that can live in your scalp and cause dandruff, itchiness, seborrhea, and other similar issues.

IMPROVED APPEARANCE WITH VOLUMIZING SHAMPOO. Experience Fuller, Shinier, Softer Hair With Improved Texture. Increases hair strengthening body, suppleness and sheen, even the damaged and distressed hair.

STIMULATE SLOW AND INACTIVE HAIR FOLLICLES. 17 key active ingredients to stimulate slow or inactive hair follicles and cleanse the scalp from sources of hair thinning to achieve thicker, stronger hair.

ADDED MAXIMUM PROTECTION. Premium blend of ingredients from our hair shampoo protects the scalp and controls odor, possible causes of itchiness, breakage, thinning hair, and other similar scalp issues.
body.description: As we age, our hair follicles stop and begin to shrink - Hair thinning can become an issue. Pura d’or advanced Therapy Shampoo distributes a proprietary combination of top rated natural ingredients and key active ingredients directly into the scalp and hair follicles for improved fuller and thick hair. It boosts cell quantities and hair production for longer lasting and stronger hair density. The 17 key active ingredients also clean and prevent the scalp of sources of hair thinning and other compounds that can cause itch, flakes, and other issues so it is a clean environment for healthier hair to develop. Our stimulating shampoo for thinning hair Revitalizes new and stronger, thicker hair, makes frizzy hair softer and more manageable, and strengthen healthy hair development. This hair Shampoo is free from sulfates, parabens, and silicones. It is Cruelty Free, hypoallergenic, and made in our facility in Southern California where we only use renewable energy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About PURA D'OR PURA D’OR is driven by the desire to provide superior solutions to your toughest beauty and personal care problems. Experience nature and purity in every formula with the combination of select natural ingredients, premium oils, and our naturally-based preservative system. Manufactured in sunny Southern California, PURA D’OR is dedicated to providing sustainable and friendly products that use renewable energy. Advanced Therapy Shampoo The Power of 17 Key Active Ingredients PURA D’OR Advanced Therapy Shampoo is one of our best plant-based hair thickening formulation. The power blend of 17 Key Active Ingredients help improve the volume and thickness of your hair, while reducing any mild scalp irritations and itching with added Zinc Pyrithione. Cleaner, thicker, healthier, itch-free hair.

Thousands of People Are Choosing PURA D'OR Over Other Brands To Promote Thicker Hair PURA D'OR Advanced Therapy Shampoo will turn your dry, damaged, distressed, frizzy, and thinning hair to a healthier, stronger, thicker hair. Here's Why... Less Hair In The Drain And On Your Brush With consistent use and the powerful blend of 17 Key Active Ingredients, customers who switched to Advanced Therapy Shampoo experienced fuller, voluminous, and fuller hair with reduced breakage. Maintain the appearance of your hair by improving strength, volume, luster, and shine While other brands use synthetic, harsh ingredients, our Advanced Therapy Shampoo use a proprietary blend of botanical ingredients and Zinc Pyrithione to help soothe your scalp from any mild itching, irritation, flakes, dryness, breakage, and thinning.

Ingredients sourced from different corners of the globe, formulated into a single bottle just for you 24 Rare & Exotic Ingredients. 17 Key Active Ingredients to Help Thinning Hair. Vitamins & Minerals For Healthy & Thicker Hair Nettle Extract: DHT Blockers such as nettle extract helps promote healthier hairSaw Palmetto: Saw palmetto reduces hair thinning and promotes thicknessHe Shou Wu: He Shou Wu improves circulation and health from scalp to tipRed Korean Seaweed: Red Korean Seaweed supports healthy hair growthArgan Oil: The superior natural hair moisturizerBlack Cumin Seed: Black cumin Seed penetrates deep to keep hair and scalp healthyAloe Vera: Aloe Vera juice as a water substitute moisturizes hair all day longTea Tree: Protects hair from itchiness and scalp irritationBiotin: An essential hair nutrient that supports healthy and thicker looking hairNiacin: Plays an important role in circulating key nutrients to improve hair and scalp healthVitamin E: Locks in moisture from scalp to tip

Advanced Therapy Hair Thinning Therapy Gold Label Anti-Hair Thinning Maximum Defense Anti-Hair Thinning Professional Grade Biotin 2X Concentrated Benefits Reduces Hair Thinning, Increases Thickness, Reduces Mild Itching Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness, and reduces dandruff and scalp irritation Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Number of Key Herbal Active Ingredients 18 15 17 19 17 Actives Concentration 1.5x 1x 1x 1x 2x Preservative System Natural, plant-based Natural, plant-based Natural, plant-based Natural, plant-based Natural, plant-based Keto ✓ USDA Biobased ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always Restore My Thick Hair
reviews.reviewText: I recently had two serious operations and lost 50% of my hair. So, I was thrilled to find this great shampoo was still available. I've used it before for similar situations and my hair grows back thick and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this line of products for several years now. I had significant hair loss after weight loss surgery, and this shampoo helped my hair grow back thicker, longer, and healthier than ever!

Muy buen champú totalmente natural. Me he realizado un transplante de pelo y cumple todas mis expectativas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 2, 2020
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I'm a black male with afro caribbean hair.First and foremost, this product does work BUT you cannot use it every single day. This shampoo does have oils inside to nourish your hair, but after you wash your hair with it, it will feel dry. After 2-3 days, your hair will start to feel soft and nourished from the oils. So i recommend you use it once every 2-3 days.This shampoo is strong and it is not designed for every day use, but it does work. If you try to use it everyday your hair will feel horrible and dry. I would have given it 5 stars but washing your hair every 2-3 days might be inconvenient for some people.
